short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Affordable & sustainable fashion is just a click away while you browse online

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💚 Love fashion but finding it hard to make affordable and sustainable choices? We see you. SUST brings you information from the likes of Fashion Revolution about the items you’re viewing, and makes it easy to buy cheaply and more sustainably through pre-loved alternatives including second-hand and rental.

➕ Add SUST to your browser. Scroll on any of the mainstream fashion sites such as ASOS.COM in https://sust.earth/sust-sites. Watch the SUST buttons appear in 🚦 colours while you search for products. Look for green, think three times about amber, and avoid red. Click on the button to find second-hand and rental equivalents easily on your favourite platforms like Depop and Vinted.

🧑🏾‍🧑 With SUST you make a difference, through your own actions and with people in the SUST community. 

🔒 You don’t need to log in. SUST gathers no personal data about you apart from an email address for news and updates, which you can unsubscribe from. See our privacy policy: https://sust.earth/privacy.

🧪 SUST is based on research carried out by Matter II Media and the University of Bristol.
